original_text: After they had gone, the men came up out of the well, and went and told King David. They said to David, “Arise, and go quickly over the water, for thus and so has Ahithophel counseled against you.”
korean_text: 그들이 간 후에 두 사람이 우물에서 올라와서 다윗 왕에게 가서 다윗 왕에게 말하여 이르되 당신들은 일어나 빨리 물을 건너가소서 아히도벨이 당신들을 해하려고 이러이러하게 계략을 세웠나이다

sentences.original_text: the men came up out of the well,
and went and told King David.
and go quickly over the water,
for thus and so has Ahithophel counseled against you.”
sentences.korean_translation: 아히도펠이 당신을 해하려고 이렇게 모의했기 때문입니다.’
